# declare configure file
configure_file(
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/felspa/base/felspa_config.h.in
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/felspa/base/felspa_config.h)

# install ordinary header files
install(
  DIRECTORY felspa
  DESTINATION ${FELSPA_INCLUDE_REL_DIR}
  FILES_MATCHING
  PATTERN "*.h")

# install config header files generated by CMAKE
install(
  DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/felspa
  DESTINATION ${FELSPA_INCLUDE_REL_DIR}
  FILES_MATCHING
  PATTERN "*.h")
